intro: Ternstroemia brevipes, commonly known as the short-stemmed ternstroemia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Theaceae. It is native to Southeast Asia, particularly found in countries like Thailand, Vietnam, and Malaysia. The plant typically grows as a small shrub or tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. Its leaves are simple, alternate, and have a smooth or slightly hairy surface. The flowers are small, white or pale yellow, and are clustered in inflorescences, contributing to its ornamental value.
